name: English Longbow Rush
description: The quintessential English opening. Focuses on rapid Feudal Age transition into constant [icon:longbowman] Longbowmen pressure.

steps.description: Queue [icon:villager] villagers. Send 6 starting villagers to [icon:sheep] sheep. Rally scout to find sheep.
1st new [icon:villager] builds [icon:house] house, then rallies to [icon:wood] wood.
2nd, 3rd, and 4th new [icon:villager] to [icon:wood] wood. Total 4 on wood.
5th new [icon:villager] builds [icon:mining_camp] Mining Camp on [icon:gold] gold. 6th new villager to [icon:gold] gold.
7th and 8th new [icon:villager] to [icon:food] food. Total 8 on food.
[icon:feudal_age] Age up with [icon:landmark] Council Hall! Use 2 villagers from [icon:wood] wood to build.
Rally new [icon:villager] villagers to [icon:food] food while aging up.
[icon:feudal_age] Feudal Age! Immediately queue [icon:longbowman] Longbowmen. Send 2 builders to [icon:wood] wood.
Research [icon:wheelbarrow] Wheelbarrow. Build [icon:blacksmith] Blacksmith for ranged upgrades.
[icon:attack] Constant production! Send 6-8 [icon:longbowman] to harass enemy wood line.
[icon:outpost] Build Outpost on [icon:gold] gold. Use 1 [icon:villager] from [icon:food] food.
[icon:barracks] Build Barracks. Produce [icon:spearman] Spearmen to counter [icon:horseman] horsemen.
